summary: Added redundancy check to /lake task creation workflow (STEP 5/Step 13) that queries state.json for existing tasks by source path or project_name pattern before creating new tasks. Modified both lake.md and SKILL.md with consistent skip tracking and updated final report format.

artifacts.summary: Added Step 13B' with jq query pattern and updated 13F report format
Added redundancy check to STEP 5C with skip tracking arrays

completion_data.completion_summary: Enhanced /lake task creation to check state.json for existing tasks before creating new ones. Added jq query checking source path and project_name pattern, skip tracking arrays, and updated final report to show skipped files.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated commands/lake.md STEP 5C with redundancy check, updated skills/skill-lake-repair/SKILL.md Step 13 with redundancy check section

next_steps: Review implementation and test with /lake on a build with errors to verify skip behavior
